publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-743 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIs—That the Parliament agrees that the following SSIs be approved: the draft Civil Legal Aid (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2000 the draft Advice and Assistance (Financial Conditions) (Scotland) Regulations 2000 the draft Advice and Assistance (Assistance by Way of Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2000.
